title: View Magnet VR
description: The system allows you to focus the attention of the player on the selected area
longDescription:
This product contains 2 Blueprints:

  1. ViewMagnetComponent Blueprint - accelerates the user's rotation in VR space if he does not look towards the chosen targets. Depending on the parameters, both a clearly noticeable or almost imperceptible effect is possible.
  2. ViewLockComponent Blueprint - locks the rotation of the camera around the Z axis so that the user cannot turn away from the Target or custom direction vector.


Video preview: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nrvRkveIxqk

Try before buy - ViewMagnetComponent: Google Drive Link

Try before buy - ViewLockComponent: Goodle Drive Link


The Blueprints allows you to:

  • Focus the attention of the player on the selected area, "attract" the player's view;
  • Divert (if InvertAction parameter is set to true) attention of the player on the selected area, "draw away" the player's view;
  • Lock the VR-camera so the uses can only look at direction you want.
  • Disorient the player in real space;
  • Add strange sensations to the game.


UPDATES

Update 1: InvertAction parameter added to ViewMagnetComponent.

Update 2: ViewLockComponent added.
technicalDetails:
Capabilities:

  • 100% Blueprint;
  • Easy to use;
  • Well commented;
  • Availability of customizable parameters;
  • Works perfectly with the basic VR template. No pawn changes needed.


ViewMagnetComponent Parameters:

  • Maximum Target Distance - the maximum distance to the target at which the target is taken into account.
  • Rotation Multiplicator - the multiplier of the maximum value of the additional rotation given to the player. 1 - means that the speed of the additional rotation is equal to the speed of rotation of the player’s head.
  • Use Smoothstep Function - additional smoothing when calculating the additional rotation multiplier.
  • Draw Debug Spheres - draw spheres indicating the currently active targets (for debug only).


ViewMagnetComponent Parameters:

  • Maximum Angular Deviation - the maximum angle that the user can turn from the Target (or Direction).
  • Custom Lock Direction and Use Custom Lock Direction - allow you to manually select the Direction vector that the Component will use.
  • Custom Target and Use Custom Target - allow you to manually select Target that the Component will use.


ViewMagnetTarget Parameters:

  • isActive - if false, this target will not be taken into account.


Contains:
